cast.name: 汤姆·塞兹摩尔 Tom Sizemore

introduction: In a small town many people don't realize a mob has been operating a daily business for years.. And, when two powerful family's come head to head One family is told, the drugs have invaded the small town already.. Is family more important then money and power.. Not even the police can prevent the drugs and blood shed in the small town streets.. Till the mob decides to get involved, to even the score with a powerful drug dealer.. Who doesn't play by anyones rules but, his own..In a small town, many people don't realize a mob has been operating a daily business for years. And, when two powerful families come head to head, one family is told the drugs have invaded the small town already. Is family more important than money and power? Not even the police can prevent the drugs and blood shed in the small town streets until the mob decides to get involved, to even the score with a powerful drug dealer who doesn't play by anyone's rules but his own.
